trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties that can be used to match a given string with a spoken phrase.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法和屬性，可用來比對指定的字串與口語的片語。

trans-unit.source: The spoken phrase can include the given string as a subset.
trans-unit.target: 語音的片語可以包含指定的字串做為子集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset"></xref> class, specifying the portion of the phrase to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset"></xref>類別，指定要比對片語的部分。

trans-unit.source: The portion of the phrase to be matched.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset"></xref> class, specifying the portion to be matched and the mode in which the text should be matched.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset"></xref>類別，指定要比對部分和模式比對文字。

trans-unit.source: The `matchingMode` parameter must a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeration.
The portion of the phrase to be matched.
The mode in which `text` should be matched with the spoken phrase.
trans-unit.target: 模式`text`應與口語片語比對。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the matching mode for the subset.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定比對的模式子集。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set MatchingMode to a value that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定為不是成員的值 MatchingMode <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode"> </xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets as string that contains the portion of a spoken phrase to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，其中包含要比對片語口語的部分。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the portion of a spoken phrase to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含要比對片語口語的部分。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Text to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定為文字<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或為空字串。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Text using a string that contains only white space characters (' ', '\t', ' ', '\r').
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定文字字串，只包含空白字元的字元 (' '，'\t'，' '，'\r')。
